com.loopj.android.jpush.http

类 JsonHttpResponseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.loopj.android.jpush.http.AsyncHttpResponseHandler
      • com.loopj.android.jpush.http.TextHttpResponseHandler
        • com.loopj.android.jpush.http.JsonHttpResponseHandler
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ResponseHandlerInterface

    public class JsonHttpResponseHandler
extends TextHttpResponseHandler
    Used to intercept and handle the responses from requests made using AsyncHttpClient, with automatic parsing into a JSONObject or JSONArray.

     

    This class is designed to be passed to get, post, put and delete requests with the #onSuccess(int, org.apache.http.Header[], org.json.JSONArray) or #onSuccess(int, org.apache.http.Header[], org.json.JSONObject) methods anonymously overridden.

     

    Additionally, you can override the other event methods from the parent class.

    • 字段概要

      • onFailure

        public final void onFailure(int statusCode,
             Header[] headers,
             byte[] responseBytes,
             java.lang.Throwable throwable)
        从类复制的说明: AsyncHttpResponseHandler
        Fired when a request fails to complete, override to handle in your own code
        覆盖:
        onFailure 在类中 TextHttpResponseHandler
        参数:
        statusCode - return HTTP status code
        headers - return headers, if any
        responseBytes - the response body, if any
        throwable - the underlying cause of the failure

      • parseResponse

        protected java.lang.Object parseResponse(byte[] responseBody)
                                  throws JSONException
        Returns Object of type JSONObject, JSONArray, String, Boolean, Integer, Long, Double or JSONObject#NULL, see org.json.JSONTokener#nextValue()
        参数:
        responseBody - response bytes to be assembled in String and parsed as JSON
        返回:
        Object parsedResponse
        抛出:
        org.json.JSONException - exception if thrown while parsing JSON
        JSONException
